name: 10th ICEAI International Congress on Engineering and Information
content: We are thrilled to extend a warm invitation to you for the 10th International Congress on Engineering and Information (ICEAI), set to take place in vibrant Taipei, Taiwan, from November 21st to 23rd, 2024\. As the premier event in the field of engineering and information, ICEAI promises to be a gathering of minds where cutting-edge research, innovative technologies, and transformative ideas converge. We are particularly excited to announce a special session at ICEAI, titled "Interdisciplinary Innovations: Exploring Semiconductors, AI, and Sustainability." This thematic focus aims to facilitate cross-disciplinary exchange and collaboration between the realms of semiconductors, artificial intelligence (AI), and sustainable technologies.
